"Hopping Mad Automata":
"Those Briadas are nothing once you get used to 'em!
All you gotta do is take 'em down so they can't spawn
any more of those pesky D-arkers. Besides, the real
danger right now is those freakin' machines! You know,
the Spardan A automata that's been popping up around
the Lost Sea? That is some scary dangerous stuff!
Not only is it an automata, it also comes hopping at
you like a maniac, making it really hard to hit. I bet
even you'd have a tough time with that thing. What,
you think you could handle it? You're joking, right?"

"ブリアーダも、慣れりゃなんてことないな！
ダーカーの種みたいなのを撃ち落としてりゃ
新しいダーカーだって産まれてこないしな！
それより、今やべーのはあいつだよあいつ！
砂漠で出てくるスパルダンＡとかいう
機甲種！　あいつまじやべーって！
機甲種だからカテーうえ、ぴょんぴょん
飛びかかってきて狙いにくいし……
ありゃ流石におたくでも苦戦必至だぜ？
やれんの？　マジでやれんの？"
